Istalif.title: Istalif
Istalif.byline: Istalif is a village in northern Kabul province, Afghanistan.

Istanbul.title: Istanbul
Istanbul.byline: Istanbul (Turkish: İstanbul) is a very large city of fantastic history, culture and beauty.

Istria.title: Istria
Istria.byline: Istria (Croatian: Istra) is the north-westernmost region of Croatia.

Istog.title: Istog
Istog.byline: Istog (Albanian: Istog, Istogu, Serbian:Исток, Istok) is a town and municipality in the north-western part of Kosovo, in the Dukagjini Plain, with an altitude of up to 2155 m. Istog has an area of 453.84 km2.

Istaravshan.title: Istaravshan
Istaravshan.byline: Istaravshan (Tajik: Истаравшан; Persian: استروشن; Russian: Истаравшан) is a city in the northern foothills of the Turkistan mountain range in the Ferghana Valley of Tajikistan.
